cleaned_sentences: Putin: Politicians in Europe fought Trump, intervened in the US electoral process Photo source: Internet // Putin: Politicians in Europe fought Trump, intervened in the US electoral process "I assure you: Trump, with his character, with his perseverance, will restore order there (in Europe) fast enough.
And all of them, you will see, stand on the feet of the master and shake their tail a little.
Everything will come in their place, â€said Vladimir Putin shortly after Donald Trump returned to the White House and confirming his positive reaction to US handling on the Ukrainian issue in a way.

Putin, in particular, speaking on the TV station "Russia 1", estimated that the Republican had the ability to "quickly restore order" in the European elites, who until recently "executed all of Biden's orders".

The European elites liked Joe Biden more and Donald Trump has different ideas for what is good and what is bad, the Russian president added, adding that "Europe was happy to execute any Washington mandate under Biden."
